body_html:
@csiz I tried running the same program in Linux environment using Python 2.7 with TensorFlow 1.10 version and broadcasting a dynamic shape works fine here without any stuck. Below is the result for the same.

Output :
('Version', 'v1.10.0-0-g656e7a2b34', '1.10.0')
('Inputs:', [0.0, array([ True, False]), array([2], dtype=int32)])
('Broadcast:', array([0., 0.], dtype=float32))
Never reached

Can you please try the same with Python 2.7 version and post your observations.

body:
@csiz    I tried running the same program in Linux environment using Python 2.7 with TensorFlow 1.10 version and broadcasting a dynamic shape works fine here without any stuck. Below is the result for the same. 

Output : 
('Version', 'v1.10.0-0-g656e7a2b34', '1.10.0')
('Inputs:', [0.0, array([ True, False]), array([2], dtype=int32)])
('Broadcast:', array([0., 0.], dtype=float32))
Never reached

Can you please try the same with Python 2.7 version and post your observations.
